positions.title: Data Scientist (R&D) and Machine Learning Engineer

given.text: Luisa brought an economist’s mindset to data science, and an entrepreneurial lens to every project, examining how we could do more with less and scrutinizing how desired outcomes would impact the bottom line. I was grateful for her can-do spirit, as well as her critical eye. She was a tremendous asset as both an analyst and an entrepreneur. See less
Luisa has a research geared inquisitive mind in addition to having outstanding leadership skills. There is no doubt that she will be a highly dedicated professional committed to excellence.
